pyLib.parallel.mulProcess module¶

mulProcess.py

My implementation of a simple class that supports multiprocessing. We are doing function level

Bases: object

A class for multi processing

debug()[source]¶

Run the simulation in debug mode.

In debug mode, we call the function directly in current process so pdb can add breakpoints.

enablePID()[source]¶

Enable PID such that the id of the process will be passed automatically

run(**kwargs)[source]¶

Run the simulation in multiple processes.

Parameters:kwargs – key-word arguments, user can specify wait time by wait=0.1
Returns:a list of return values from each process
